publications.name: Depth-corrected multi-factor dissection of chromatin accessibility for scATAC-seq data with PACS
publications.summary: Single cell ATAC-seq (scATAC-seq) experiments have various conditions that can influence the outcome of sequencing results. Its sparsity further complicates this problem, and it is presented in the form of batch effect. We present a zero-adjusted model to allow for complex hypothesis testing while accounting for the sparsity. We have tested on various ATAC-seq datasets to prove that it controls for false positive while achieving 17% to 122% higher power compared to existing tools.

publications.name: A structure-informed atlas of human-virus interactions
publications.summary: We have explored protein-protein interaction (PPI) between virus and human on a larger scale. We sought to construct a structural similarity-based model to predict ~282,000 viral-human PPI's

publications.name: Wnt activation is implicated in glioblastoma radioresistance
publications.summary: We confirmed that for glioblastoma patients presenting resistance to radiation therapy may have genomic signatures that show activation in the Wnt pathway.
